summary: brutal double-headed axe with many nasty edges and spikes.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Basher Axe by primnull[/b]

[size=5]View in 3d here
[url=http://p3d.in/BcHNF]http://p3d.in/BcHNF[/url][/size]

Description: A brutal double-headed axe with many nasty edges and spikes.
Modeled in Maya 2014 and textured with Photoshop and Quixel Suite 2.0

uploaded to NexusMods on Feb24-2016

[size=5][u]This is a MODDERS RESOURCE and not an actual mod; it is simply a 3d model file.[/u][/size]
Formats included: Maya, Object, 3DSMAX (2013). It can be opened in most 3d programs, ie 3dsmax, Maya, Blender, etc. NIF conversion is possible

Inside of the Maps folder are the following: AO, Color, Diffuse, Gloss, Normal, Specular.
Also included is UV_sheet if you want to redo it by yourself for whatever reason

All maps are 2048x2048 and the model is fully unwrapped using Maya 2014, UVDeluxe and NinjaDojo

This model is 100% free and be used for any purpose, personal or commercial but Email me if you have used this in a mod.
Please give credit! Thanks!
